abstract: The bank doled out huge payments to settle legal claims related to its troubled mortgage division. The loss was steep, but it was fully baked into expectations.
snippet: The bank doled out huge payments to settle legal claims related to its troubled mortgage division. The loss was steep, but it was fully baked into expectations.
lead_paragraph: 8:34 a.m. | Updated  Bank of America reported a loss of $8.8 billion in the second quarter as it doled out huge payments to settle legal claims related to its troubled mortgage division.

headline.main: At Bank of America, an $8.8 Billion Loss
